prompts.How big is the largest pizza?: The largest pizza ever made was 1,261.65 square meters, achieved by Dovilio Nardi, Andrea Mannocchi, Marco Nardi, Matteo Nardi and Matteo Giannotte in Rome, Italy, on December 13, 2012.
prompts.Where is the tallest building?: The tallest building is the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
